data.name: App_DataDictionary_procSetDatabaseRoutineParameter_Insert_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
Declare @CatalogId UniqueIdentifier = NewId(), @ModelId UniqueIdentifier = null, @Server SysName = @@ServerName, @Catalog [App_DataDictionary].[typeDatabaseCatalog], @Schema [App_DataDictionary].[typeDatabaseSchema], @Routine [App_DataDictionary].[typeDatabaseRoutine], @RoutineParamter [App_DataDictionary].[typeDatabaseRoutineParameter]
Insert Into @Catalog Select @CatalogId As [CatalogId], Db_Name() As [CatalogTitle], Convert(NvarChar,Null) As [CatalogDescription], 'Database' As [ScopeName], @Server As [SourceServerName], Db_Name() As [SourceDatabaseName], GetDate() As [SourceDate]
Insert Into @Schema Select @CatalogId As [CatalogId], [CATALOG_NAME] As [DatabaseName], [SCHEMA_NAME] As [SchemaName], 'Database.Schema' As [ScopeName] From [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[SCHEMATA]
Insert Into @Routine Select @CatalogId As [CatalogId], [ROUTINE_CATALOG] As [DatabaseName], [ROUTINE_SCHEMA] As [SchemaName], [ROUTINE_NAME] As [RoutineName], Case When [ROUTINE_TYPE] In ('PROCEDURE') Then 'Database.Schema.Procedure' When [ROUTINE_TYPE] In ('FUNCTION') Then 'Database.Schema.Function' Else 'Error' End As [ScopeName], [ROUTINE_TYPE] As [RoutineType] From [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[ROUTINES]
Insert Into @RoutineParamter Select @CatalogId As [CatalogId], P.[SPECIFIC_CATALOG] As [DatabaseName], P.[SPECIFIC_SCHEMA] As [SchemaName], P.[SPECIFIC_NAME] As [RoutineName], IIF(R.[ROUTINE_TYPE] IN ('FUNCTION') AND P.[ORDINAL_POSITION] = 0,'RETURN',P.[PARAMETER_NAME]) As [ParameterName], Case When R.[ROUTINE_TYPE] In ('PROCEDURE') Then 'Database.Schema.Procedure.Parameter' When R.[ROUTINE_TYPE] In ('FUNCTION') Then 'Database.Schema.Function.Parameter' Else 'Error' End As [ScopeName], P.[ORDINAL_POSITION] As [OrdinalPosition], P.[DATA_TYPE] As [DataType], P.[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] As [CharacterMaximumLength], P.[CHARACTER_OCTET_LENGTH] As [CharacterOctetLength], P.[NUMERIC_PRECISION] As [NumericPrecision], P.[NUMERIC_PRECISION_RADIX] As [NumericPrecisionRadix], P.[NUMERIC_SCALE] As [NumericScale], P.[DATETIME_PRECISION] As [DateTimePrecision], P.[CHARACTER_SET_CATALOG] As [CharacterSetCatalog], P.[CHARACTER_SET_SCHEMA] As [CharacterSetSchema], P.[CHARACTER_SET_NAME] As [CharacterSetName], P.[COLLATION_CATALOG] As [CollationCatalog], P.[COLLATION_SCHEMA] As [CollationSchema], P.[COLLATION_NAME] As [CollationName], P.[USER_DEFINED_TYPE_CATALOG] As [DomainCatalog], P.[USER_DEFINED_TYPE_SCHEMA] As [DomainSchema], P.[USER_DEFINED_TYPE_NAME] As [DomainName] From [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[PARAMETERS] P Inner Join [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[ROUTINES] R On P.[SPECIFIC_CATALOG] = R.[SPECIFIC_CATALOG] And P.[SPECIFIC_SCHEMA] = R.[SPECIFIC_SCHEMA] And P.[SPECIFIC_NAME] = R.[SPECIFIC_NAME]
Begin Try; Begin Transaction; Set NoCount On;
Exec [App_DataDictionary].[procSetDatabaseCatalog] @ModelId, @CatalogId, @Catalog Exec [App_DataDictionary].[procSetDatabaseSchema] @ModelId, @CatalogId, @Schema Exec [App_DataDictionary].[procSetDatabaseRoutine] @ModelId, @CatalogId, @Routine Exec [App_DataDictionary].[procSetDatabaseRoutineParameter] @ModelId, @CatalogId, @RoutineParamter
Select D.* From [App_DataDictionary].[DatabaseCatalog] D Inner Join [App_DataDictionary].[DatabaseCatalog_AK] A On D.[CatalogId] = A.[CatalogId] Where A.[CatalogId] = @CatalogId
Select D.* From [App_DataDictionary].[DatabaseSchema] D Inner Join [App_DataDictionary].[DatabaseSchema_AK] A On D.[SchemaId] = A.[SchemaId] Where A.[CatalogId] = @CatalogId
Select D.* From [App_DataDictionary].[DatabaseRoutineParameter] D Inner Join [App_DataDictionary].[DatabaseRoutineParameter_AK] A On D.[ParameterId] = A.[ParameterId] Where A.[CatalogId] = @CatalogId
Print 'Transaction Success, Rollback Issued'; Rollback Transaction; End Try Begin Catch Print 'Rollback Issued'; Rollback Transaction; Throw; End Catch;
